ComicInfo.Summary:
While the paladin Aidus journeys to the capital with his new ally, the powerful sorcerer Zed-Kraken, the beautiful half-elf Vail fights a lone battle against a pair of savage were-rats! Will Aidus survive a duel to the death, not to mention political conflicts and assassinations? And who are the mysterious were-rats, and what of the other pair watching and waiting in the shadows? And what is the tragic past that ties all our heroes together? Find out, if you dare!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/dungeons-dragons-tempests-gate-2-forged-in-tears/4000-144449/
ComicInfo.Title: Forged In Tears
